node.title: Interested in Getting More out of BitTorrent Classic? Check Out our New Tip of the Day!
node.content:
BitTorrent/µTorrent Classic is the original torrent client for bulk downloading and comes with an abundance of features, including scheduled downloads, configurable display options and UI settings, auto shutdown, file organizing tools, ability to connect remotely, bandwidth optimization, and much more.

With so many features, including BitTorrent Speed and BTT Token that help drive faster download speeds, our new Tip of the Day articles are designed to help you get the most out of BitTorrent/µTorrent Classic configuration options.

Our customer support team is taking the most popular FAQs and generating detailed information guides (AKA Tip of the Days) to help you get more out of our popular desktop torrent clients. Check out our first article to learn how to schedule downloads in BitTorrent/µTorrent Classic. Please be sure to tell us what you think by providing feedback here.
